name: Dr. Chau-Wai Wong
research: Dr. Wong's research interests encompass machine learning, multimedia forensics, signal and image processing, data analytics, and video coding, with recent emphasis on federated learning and generative models.
prospective_students: Prospective Ph.D. students are expected to have a solid undergraduate course in probability/statistics and a machine learning/neural network course. Ph.D. students will take more stat/math courses and other ECE core courses. Masters students aiming for publication should email with research ideas. Well-prepared undergraduates are also considered for research opportunities.
